title: Bullseye
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{flavour|Just in case you had trouble getting hit.}}
[[File:Shield_Bullseye.png]] '''''the +15 shield "Bullseye"'''''

+15 [[shield]]

-5 EV

==Desirability==
Unfortunately, "'''Bullseye'''" is a fairly useless shield. If you're looking for more SH in exchange for EV, then you should probably just upgrade to a [[large shield]]. Only [[kobold]]s and [[halfling]]s might consider wearing this, and even they probably wouldn't: the SH increase is really not worth the EV penalty, especially considering that plenty of non-artefact shields offer useful resistances.

==History==
In earlier versions, Bullseye used to be a [[buckler]].

Bullseye was removed in [[0.14]].
